resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81699</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81699</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7502</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Weather Sayings Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre refranes del tiempo</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Ráitis Aimsire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wettersayings-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Survivez à Au Jeu D'Énonciations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Dos Provérbios Do Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Di Detti Del Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων καιρικών ρητών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupil will learn about weather lore. The pupil will find out that there are many weather sayings. Pupils will explain in their own words a number of the sayings.</string>
            <string language="es">El alumno adquirirá conocimientos sobre el tiempo. El alumno descubrirá que hay muchos refranes sobre el tiempo. Los alumnos explicarán en sus propias palabras varios refranes.</string>
            <string language="ga">Foghlaimeoidh an dalta faoi sheanchas na haimsire. Foghlaimeoidh an dalta go bhfuil go leor ráitis aimsire ann. Míneoidh daltaí ina bhfocail féin go bhfuil go leor ráitis ann.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schüler erlernt über Wetterüberlieferung. 
Die Schüler findet heraus, daß es viele Wetter Sayings gibt. 
Schüler erklären in ihren eigenen Wörtern eine Anzahl von den
Sayings.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'élève apprendra survivent à environ au 
savoir. L'élève découvrira qu'il y a beaucoup survivent à
à des énonciations. Les élèves expliqueront dans leurs 
propres mots un certain nombre d'énonciations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O aluno aprenderá sobre o lore do tempo. O 
aluno encontrará para fora que há muitos provérbios do tempo. 
Os alunos explicarão em suas próprias palavras um número de 
provérbios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'allievo imparerà circa lore del tempo. 
L'allievo scoprirà che ci sono molti detti del tempo. Gli
allievi spiegheranno nelle loro proprie parole un certo numero di 
detti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μαθητής θα μάθει για την καιρική γνώση. Ο 
μαθητής θα ανακαλύψει ότι υπάρχουν πολλά καιρικά ρητά. Οι
μαθητές θα εξηγήσουν στις λέξεις τους διάφορα ρητά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
